concept.title: Welcome to XMetaL Author DITA Edition
concept.shortdesc: No other DITA-based authoring solution offers the depth, performance, and flexibility of XMetaL Author DITA Edition. Building on XMetaL Authorâ€™s best-of-breed feature set, the DITA Edition provides an environment optimized for common technical writing tasks:

ul.li: Get productive right away with ready-to-use topic templates.
Insert commonly-used DITA elements using simple menu items.
Insert cross-references, images, index markers, inline elements, and metadata using dialogs. Dialogs can be customized for your own requirements.

Create and preview DITA conrefs through easy-to-manage reusable components.
XMetaL Author DITA Edition automatically generates the unique element IDs needed for cross-references and reusable components to work.
Content is continuously validated and is saved as DITA XML, ready for output through any DITA-compliant stylesheet you choose.
Cleanly view topic links in DITA maps.
Save time by creating new topics and adding them to a map in one step.
Easily browse for existing topics to add to a map.
Rapidly organize and reorder topic links with an intuitive user interface.
